verses.text: I gave my heart to Jesus, He saved me from my sins; He made me heir of heaven, And there my joy begins.
How perfect is the Bible, How precious is the word, I love the holy scriptures, For they tell of the Lord.
I love my blessed Jesus, He fills my heart with joy; He gives me strength to follow Him, And serves me in his sight.
I love the name of Jesus, It sounds like music sweet; I love to meet with Christians, And worship at his feet.
